sourcesContent: import { ViewIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons'; import { Button, IconButton, Image, Modal, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, ModalContent, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, ModalOverlay, Text, useDisclosure } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import React from 'react' const ProfileModal = ({user,children}) => { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); return ( <> {children ? ( {children} ) : ( } onClick={onOpen} /> )} {user.name} Email:{ user.email} ); } export default ProfileModal;
